title: Bug 110566: Incorrect result returned when setting an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When setting a filter like "row[0] equals to 0", the result set is incorrect or null.
OB: When I set a filter in the data set using the expression "row[0] equals to " and click on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: An error message should be displayed indicating that the filter expression is invalid.
SR:
1. Open the data set.
2. Set a filter using the expression "row[0] equals to ".
3. Click on the Preview tab.
4. Verify that an error message is displayed.
